result.title: Tasks connected with finances.
result.content: Do you know any problems connected with stock, finances, economy, planning etc. like this one, but a little bit easier (but not so easy like standard activity planning)? The ones with very clever greedy or constructive solutions. I love such problems and would like to see more of them. They don't have to be from codeforces. http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/391/F2
